/* eslint-disable react/no-unescaped-entities */ import React from 'react' import Layout from '../components/Layout' import Link from 'next/link' export default function About() { return (

About MRAZOTA

MRAZOTA is a small, independent brand focused on building delightful digital experiences. We design and ship curated products, creative media, and lightweight web-games that prioritize performance, accessibility, and clear design. Our goal is to help users enjoy polished interfaces and playful interactions while keeping privacy and simplicity first.

Founded with a focus on quality over quantity, we collaborate with small teams and independent creators to deliver thoughtful UI patterns, tools, and experimental projects. If you'd like to learn more, check out our store or reach out via the contact page.

Contact us
) }

import React from 'react' import Header from '../components/Header' import HeroSection from '../components/HeroSection' import PostCard from '../components/PostCard' import Footer from '../components/Footer' const posts = [ { id: '1', title: 'Designing for Delight: Micro-interactions That Matter', excerpt: 'Small animations can create big feelings. Learn how to craft micro-interactions that delight users.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1545235617-9465f8a9de0d?q=80&w=1200&auto=format&fit=crop', tag: 'Design' }, { id: '2', title: 'Modern Layout Patterns with CSS Grid & Flexbox', excerpt: 'A concise guide to responsive layout patterns that scale from phones to large displays.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1555066931-4365d14bab8c?q=80&w=1200&auto=format&fit=crop', tag: 'CSS' }, { id: '3', title: 'Accessible UI: Tips for Keyboard & Screen Reader Support', excerpt: 'Simple patterns to make your interfaces usable for everyone without sacrificing style.', image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1547658719-da2b51169166?q=80&w=1200&auto=format&fit=crop', tag: 'Accessibility' } ] export default function Homepage() { return (

Latest posts

{posts.map((p) => ( ))}

Join the newsletter for the best UI patterns, accessibility tips, and Tailwind recipes.

) }

import React from 'react' import Layout from '../components/Layout' export default function Privacy() { return (

Privacy Policy

Last updated: October 23, 2025

Introduction

MRAZOTA ("we", "us", "our") respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share and protect your information when you visit our website.

Data we collect

  • Contact information you provide (name, email, message).
  • Technical data collected automatically (IP address, browser, device, pages visited).
  • Cookies and similar tracking technologies.

How we use your data

We use data to respond to inquiries, operate and improve the site, provide support, and comply with legal obligations. We do not sell personal data to third parties.

Cookies

We use cookies to enable core site functionality, remember preferences, and provide analytics. You can control cookies via your browser settings. For more advanced control, please consult your browser documentation.

Your rights (GDPR)

If you are in the European Economic Area, you have rights including access, rectification, deletion, restriction of processing, data portability, and the right to object. To exercise these rights, contact us at you@example.com. We may need to verify your identity before fulfilling requests.

Contact

If you have questions about this policy or our data practices, please contact us at you@example.com.

 ) }

import React from 'react' import Layout from '../components/Layout' export default function Terms() { return (

Terms of Service

Last updated: October 23, 2025

Acceptance of terms

By using this website you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use the site.

Use of site

You agree to use the site lawfully and not to attempt to disrupt services, upload malicious content, or infringe third party rights.

Intellectual property

All content on this site is owned by or licensed to MRAZOTA. You may view and share content for personal use but may not redistribute or republish without permission.

Limitation of liability

To the maximum extent permitted by law, MRAZOTA is not liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from use of the site.

Changes

We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use of the site after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

 ) }

messages.message: Unused eslint-disable directive (no problems were reported from 'no-console').

source:
import React from 'react'
import { createRoot } from 'react-dom/client'
import App from './App'
import './index.css'

const el = document.getElementById('root')!
createRoot(el).render(
  <React.StrictMode>
    <App />
  </React.StrictMode>
)
